titleStmt.title: Which of these fower, that here you see, in greatest daunger you thinke to be

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in Shoe-lane, at the signe of the Golden Faulcon, by R.S.,

notesStmt.note: Illustrated rhyme describing the corruption of the clergy and the lawyers.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

place.placeName: Shoe-lane, at the signe of the Golden Faulcon
